history.reason: That's a lovely wish, little developer! Having PenguinMod right on your desktop would be quite convenient for all your coding adventures. Ho ho ho!`
Ho ho ho! It seems you've already made a wish, little developer. Making an empty wish right after another is a bit like asking for an extra cookie when you've just received one!

Ho ho ho! It seems you've already made two wishes, little developer, and the second one was already a bit naughty for being empty! Wishing for just an emoji is a bit like leaving an empty stocking, and Santa needs a little more detail than that to bring you joy!
